title: It Always Feels Like Someone is Trying to Steal the Consignment - Novel Updates
genre: Historical   Martial Arts   Shounen Ai   Wuxia
author: Lu Tianyi   吕天逸
description:
A Tang Sect disciple goes into the Longmen Desert with a consignment of silvers……

He finds himself surrounded by a group of righteous sect’s disciples……. _(:з」∠)_>
